scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "python -m backend.app" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:lan: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "python -m backend.app" "npm --prefix frontend run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0"
scripts.release: npm --prefix frontend run build && node scripts/release.mjs
